ComicInfo.Summary:
In a terrifying fortress decorated with dead soldiers, Hellboy reels from recent revelations about his bloodline and his connection to British history, and to the Queen of Blood herself. But thereâ€™s little time for him to consider his destiny when Astaroth arrives, leading to a battle that will tear down the castle walls around the unconscious Alice.
This issue also includes a backup story featuring Henry Hood, the zealous witchfinder introduced in Hellboy: Darkness Calls!
